resources.string: There are three buttons on this screen, the upper half is the learn button, the lower left fourth is the practice button and the lower right fourth is the exit button
Wellcome to braille souls accessible edition
Drag you finger through the screen, when it beeps means you are at a braille dot, if it also vibrate it means that the dot is active
Double tap to go forward, long press to go backward, tap with two fingers to go back to the menu
